short_description: Discover the rugged beauty and fascinating history of Afghanistan, where ancient cities and stunning mountains are waiting to be explored. Meet friendly locals and learn about their culture while savoring delicious Afghan cuisine

weather.title: Afghanistan's climate is varied, with the majority of the country experiencing a continental climate characterized by hot summers and cold winters. The highlands and mountainous regions have a more alpine climate, with colder temperatures and significant snowfall in winter

when_to_visit.title: Mild and dry
when_to_visit.time_period: Spring (March to May), Autumn (September to November)
when_to_visit.short_description: Pleasant temperatures perfect for sightseeing and outdoor activities

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Advisable to avoid visiting during summer due to high temperatures and occasional dust storms

when_to_visit.title: Snow lovers
when_to_visit.short_description: Temperatures drop below freezing, especially in mountainous areas

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Afghanistan is during the spring and autumn seasons when the weather is mild and pleasant, providing optimal conditions for exploring the country's natural beauty and cultural heritage
